{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LevelOne |model=WBR-6802 |revision=v1.0 |upc=846359015070 |ean= |asin=B00788BKQU |price= |est_release_date=04/19/2011 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf=Netronix |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1633E |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-6T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188RE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=portable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=LevelOne |default_ssid_regex=^LevelOne$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''150Mbps Wireless Travel Router''
[http://global.level1.com/Wireless/WBR-6802/p-1973.htm Product page] The manual specifies the following.. *'''Transmit Power''' **802.11b: typically 16dBm **802.11g: typically 14dBm **802.11n: typically 13dBm *'''Receiver Sensitivity''' **802.11b: typically -84dBm **802.11n: typically -73dBm **802.11n: typically -68dBm The manual's HTTP interface shows the device with an 00:08:54 ('''Netronix''') OUI. '''Netronix''' is presumed to be the OEM. ==Firmware== ===v1.02=== ====binwalk dump==== 
DECIMAL   	HEX       	DESCRIPTION
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16        	0x10      	bzip2 compressed data, block size = 900k
108273    	0x1A6F1   	LZMA compressed data, properties: 0x88, dictionary size: 336068608 bytes, uncompressed size: 29696 bytes
108413    	0x1A77D   	LZMA compressed data, properties: 0x88, dictionary size: 336068608 bytes, uncompressed size: 29696 bytes

119228    	0x1D1BC   	LZMA compressed data, properties: 0x5D, dictionary size: 8388608 bytes, uncompressed size: 2158592 bytes
679374    	0xA5DCE   	Squashfs filesystem, big endian, version 2.0, size: 912768 bytes, 163 inodes, blocksize: 65536 bytes, created: Tue Apr 12 21:32:14 2011
1588861   	0x183E7D  	LZMA compressed data, properties: 0xDC, dictionary size: 218103808 bytes, uncompressed size: 19680 bytes
